1651650.name: RPG Maker MZ - Krachware Cyberpunk Tileset Pack
1651650.description:
Start building your next Cyberpunk themed world with the help of the Krachware Cyberpunk Tileset Pack by Gee Kun Soft. This pack focuses on factory, underground, and Sci-Fi elements for building your surroundings. Included are items for Sci-Fi rooms such as chairs and beds along with assets for factory and underground locations like metal stairways, pipes, valves, switches, fans, and more.

The Krachware Cyberpunk Tileset Pack includes a clean futuristic flare along with a more tarnished style that will suite any creator looking for these elements in their next RPG!

Features:

* 9 character sheets
* 4 Factory tilesets, 4 Sci-Fi tilesets, 5 underground tilesets

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1651650.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
